title: Sr. Content Support Engineer, Apple Services Engineering
summary: The Apple Services Engineering team powers the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Podcasts, and Apple Books, delivering entertainment in over 35 languages to more than 150 countries. This role involves working on Apple Music, Apple Books, and Apple Podcast ecosystem.
description: We're looking for a Content Support Engineer with a passion for Music, Books, and Podcasts. The ideal candidate will improve customer experience and service quality. You will work on supporting various projects and features across the Apple Services Engineering organization, partnering closely with engineering teams.
key_qualifications: 5+ years of experience in debugging technical issues, Proficient in SQL and Experience with the Big-Data ecosystem, Excellent scripting knowledge with Python, Debugging API requests and response issues, Excellent verbal and written communication skills
preferred_qualifications: Experience with logging, telemetry, and monitoring tools like Splunk, Experience with programming and git repo, Ability to self-start, learn, plan, prioritize, Excellent interpersonal skills, Strong sense of personal responsibility, Understanding priorities and not compromising quality
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $136,300 and $248,700 and depends on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple also offers employee stock programs, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, tuition reimbursement, and other benefits.
